text: Vladimir Vlasov (born 6 July 1958) is a Soviet ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1980 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of the Soviet Union Category:Ski jumpers at the 1980 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Vladimir Vlasov (ski jumper)
